mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT SEQ, ID, LPAD(' ',6*5*"DEPTH"+1,' ')|| CASE WHEN "DEPTH" > 0 THEN '' END || TITLE AS TITLE, CONTENT, "REF", STEP, "DEPTH", REGDATE, DELFLAG, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY REF DESC, STEP) RN FROM ANSWERBOARD a WHERE DELFLAG = 'N' ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{first} AND #{last}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ANSWERBOARD
WHERE DELFLAG = 'N'
SELECT SEQ, ID, TITLE, CONTENT, "REF", STEP, "DEPTH", TO_CHAR(REGDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:mi:ss') AS REGDATE, DELFLAG FROM ANSWERBOARD WHERE SEQ = #{seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE ANSWERBOARD SET STEP = STEP+1 WHERE REF = (SELECT REF FROM ANSWERBOARD WHERE SEQ = #{seq}) AND STEP > (SELECT STEP FROM ANSWERBOARD WHERE SEQ = #{seq})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ANSWERBOARD (SEQ, ID, TITLE, CONTENT, "REF", STEP, "DEPTH", REGDATE) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ),0)+1 FROM ANSWERBOARD),#{id},#{title}, #{content}, (SELECT REF FROM ANSWERBOARD WHERE SEQ = #{seq}), (SELECT STEP FROM ANSWERBOARD WHERE SEQ = #{seq})+1, (SELECT "DEPTH" FROM ANSWERBOARD WHERE SEQ = #{seq})+1,CURRENT_DATE )
